Description:
Comfortable, Convenient And Ready To Be Enjoyed
Moments from parklands and an easy stroll to the station, schools, High Street's cafes and eateries and the Plaza, this much loved family home on a generous allotment delivers a perfect opportunity to get a fabulous start in a lifestyle location.
Three bedrooms including a main with ensuite complement three generous living areas including family meals opening to a private alfresco area. Comfortable, convenient and ready to be enjoyed today, it provides exciting scope to further update if desired.
• Ducted heating & air conditioner
• Solid timber kitchen
• Three spacious living areas
• Large garage with workshop space
• Shed
• Outdoor entertainment area

Description:
Rush To Brush!
The quality features, spacious living and great location offered by this family home all add up to a fabulous owner occupier lifestyle or investment opportunity. Stylishly presented interior spaces feature a sleek stone finished kitchen showcasing stainless steel appliances and anchoring a generous casual living zone and three bedrooms including main with an ensuite and large walk-in robe. It enjoys a fabulous location central to Epping Plaza and station in one direction, and Westfield and South Morang station in the other!
-Ducted heating
-Split system unit
-Garage with all-weather convenience of internal access
-Easy care tiles to living spaces
-Large rear yard
-Stone kitchen with stainless steel appliances

Unbeatable way to join the Market!
Find yourself situated within close proximity to all local amenities such as Epping Pacific Shopping Centre, St Monica's College, St Peters Primary, Northern Hospital, Epping Train Station, bus stops with so much more infrastructure set to come in the near future ensuring capital growth.
Your chance to nest or invest in this well-maintained ground floor apartment, comprising one large bedroom serviced by an adjoining two-way bathroom, spacious kitchen overseeing a generous living area and separate laundry.
Further features include split system heating and cooling.
Currently leased out until the 29/06/18 for $1173 pcm.

Approved Plans and Permits for 5 x Unit Development Site
A rare opportunity to develop and reap the rewards in Epping's most sought after location. Surrounded by amenities such as train station, major shopping and popular schools include R.M.I.T. and St Monica's College, Northern hospital and easy Ring Road access. All five units are approx. 120sqm to 130sqm in size with a modern design, includes 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms accommodation, garages and balconies. Plans are available on request.

Description:
Spacious Living in a superb Location
Within close proximity to all your local amenities such as Pacific Epping, Northern Hospital, Freeway access, Schools, Epping Train Station and public transport. Walking distance to upcoming 7 eleven and more shops.
This large near new apartment boasts one large bedroom (large built in robe) serviced by an adjoining two-way bathroom with double shower, spacious kitchen overseeing generous living area and separate laundry with storage space included.
Further features include:
- a large outdoor balcony (with external power)
- split system heating and cooling,
- dishwasher (Deakin)
- separate lockable storage room inside the building
- underground secure car park with remote control gate
- quality stainless steel appliances
Don't miss out on this great opportunity!

Description:
SOLD by Sugath Warnasuriya- More Homes Wanted!
Located in the heart of Aurora Estate in one of Epping's most sought after locations this home is within walking distance to all amenities including tennis courts, parklands, childcare centre, local café's/shops and St Mary of the Cross MacKillop primary School.
This well presented home offers three spacious bedrooms, two with built in robes plus a walk-in robe and full en-suite for the Master. Central kitchen is well appointed offering 900mm Stainless steel appliances and dishwasher which overlooks the main dining. Two large separate living zones and alfresco is perfect for entertaining family and friends.
Other features include reverse cycle heating and cooling system through the home, boosted solar hot water, downlights throughout, well established low maintenance front and back yard and garden shed
Land size – 400m2
Built year – 2009
Potential rental return -$400 per week
Builder – Timeless Homes

Description:
Immaculate & Ready to Move in
This immaculately presented townhouse is situated close to all amenities, Epping Plaza, Schools Public transport and is ideal for the first home buyers or investors & retirees. Step into this spacious home with multiple living zones that compliments the open plan with plenty of light throughout and enjoy all the comforts it has on offer. Offering four generous sized bedrooms, (master bedroom upstairs with full ensuite with Built in robes), including one bedroom downstairs that can easily be converted to theatre room/separate lounge. Generous sized kitchen with & dishwasher, built in pantry with adjoining meals area. Spacious formal lounge & dining area, floating timber floorboards, security shutters & security doors, double lock up garage with remote, generous sized courtyard, split system aircon, Gas Ducted Heating and evaporative cooling. This is an opportunity to secure a fantastic family home or investment so why wait? enquire today !!

An opportunity too good to miss for the smart Investor, professional couple or retirees looking at downsizing in this striking apartment. Offers a large master bedroom with a two way bathroom, separate laundry, modern kitchen with fantastic open plan living and dining (with access to balcony) and secure car parking.
Other Extra's include dishwasher, intercom security, heating and cooling, separate lockable room for storage, balcony/terrace with views, and only minutes away from Epping plaza shopping centre, Epping Views Primary School, parks, playgrounds, Lyndarum Town Centre with Woolworths.

Description:
When Only the Best Will Do
This is the one you have been looking for – luxury and location on a generous 512m2 block. Set in one of the finest locations in the prestigious Lyndarum Estate, this immaculate family residence has style, sophistication and space for your family to enjoy. The moment you walk inside you will be greeted with a wide entrance foyer & high ceilings that compliments the open plan with floating timber floorboards throughout, you will instantly feel the warmth of a great family home. With commanding street presence, multiple living zones and quality workmanship effortlessly brings indoor and outdoor living together that has a light filled ambience throughout this spacious home.
With the rarity of a downstairs bedroom and bathroom, this is perfect for the growing family or those expecting guests. Enjoy a spacious kitchen equipped with 900ml stainless steel appliances, walk in pantry, stone waterfall benchtops and island breakfast bar overlooking the open plan living and adjoining meals area. A second downstairs living zone is the perfect kids retreat, theatre room or sixth bedroom. Enjoy seamless transitions from inside to out, through sliding doors you will find a great size alfresco, a huge rear yard with manicured gardens complimented with bamboo fencing and adding to this is a garden shed and workshop with front and rear access.
Moving upstairs enjoy a spacious family retreat, a huge master bedroom with full ensuite and walk in robe and space to sit and relax. Three more large bedrooms with built in robes services by a spacious & bright central bathroom. Added Features: Ducted heating, Evaporative Cooling, Double Glazed Windows, Ducted Vacuum System, Alarm, Double lock up garage with internal access & Quality Window furnishings. Perfectly positioned within close proximity to park, public transport, schools and local shops this property is sure to impress and inspection is a must.
Insights: 12 Mecklenburg Close, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2019 and 15 other 5 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
WORK, REST & PLAY
This home is unique in its design and set up. Perfect for the tradesman with a separate freestanding office / workspace out back. High access to the backyard through the lock up car port, ample concrete for the work van(s) plus storage shed. You can bring your work home with you or live it up in this large yard. The house includes 3 large bedrooms, full ensuite, main bathroom is fully renovated with flat floor drainage and 10mm glass shower screens; "it's like bathing in your own hotel". Two separate living areas, ducted heating, air-con, alarm, established low maintenance gardens & more. Perfectly located with many options to all amenities as this is truly central Epping. Easy living, a stand out, ready for the growing busy family. Call today & secure your tomorrow today.

Description:
Impressive Family Home In The Popular Aurora Estate.
This lovely home is perfectly maintained and conveniently located close to schools and shopping and on a generous 500sqm allotment. Boasting a formal light filled entrance with direct access to the double garage, a spacious formal living room, a well equipped kitchen with island bar overlooking the open plan dinning and family room, 4 generous bedrooms master with its own ensuite and W.I.R and the sparkling family bathroom. This home is complete with all the wanted extras including tiled floors to the main traffic area, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 5 star energy rating and a low maintenance established garden. Nothing more to do except move right in and enjoy.

Description:
Triple Storey Living in the Heart of Epping
This architecturally designed home brings together exceptional living and central locality.
Within walking distance to all amenities and public transport, this home offers an enviable opportunity to own your own piece of exclusive real estate. Boasting top floor master bedroom with ensuite, walk in robe, and balcony, central kitchen with Caesarstone benchtops, undermount sink, glass splashback and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, quality fixtures and fittings throughout, timber floors to living areas, quality tiles to all wet areas, private courtyard, roof top gardens, heating and cooling, and intercom with 2 screens complete this perfect package.
Guaranteed to impress, with quality fixtures and fittings throughout and detailed specifications available on request, be a part of this Epping Central transformation!
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.

Description:
NEST OR INVEST! 595m2 (approx.) (S.T.C.A)
Positioned on huge parcel of land this beauty is perfect for the first home buyer, downsizers or an astute investor. Comprises two generous sized bedrooms plus a study/3rd bedroom, open plan kitchen and a spacious rumpus/sun room. Positioned in one of Epping's favourite pockets, this beautifully presented home provides an immediate enjoyable family lifestyle along with numerous options to enhance. Added benefits include heating, cooling and a massive backyard perfect for all year round entertainment ! Within walking distance to epping train station, primary and secondary schools and easy proximity to pacific plaza and northern hospital.
A rare treat to find, this property will be a must inspect!
